verses.verse: Bless <S%H1288><s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, O my <S%H5315>soul<s%>. O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> my <S%H430>God<s%>, thou art <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H1431>great<s%>; Thou art <S%H3847>clothed<s%> with <S%H1935>honor<s%> and <S%H1926>majesty<s%>:
Who <S%H5844>coverest<s%> thyself with <S%H216>light<s%> as with a <S%H8008>garment<s%>; Who stretchest <S%H5186>out<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> like a <S%H3407>curtain<s%>;

Who layeth the <S%H7136>beams<s%> of his <S%H5944>chambers<s%> in the <S%H4325>waters<s%>; Who <S%H7760>maketh<s%> the <S%H5645>clouds<s%> his <S%H7398>chariot<s%>; Who <S%H1980>walketh<s%> upon the <S%H3671>wings<s%> of the <S%H7307>wind<s%>;
Who <S%H6213>maketh<s%> <S%H7307>winds<s%> his <S%H4397>messengers<s%>; <S%H3857>Flames<s%> of <S%H784>fire<s%> his <S%H8334>ministers<s%>;
Who <S%H3245>laid<s%> the <S%H4349>foundations<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>, That it should not be <S%H4131>moved<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%>.
Thou <S%H3680>coveredst<s%> it with the <S%H8415>deep<s%> as with a <S%H3830>vesture<s%>; The <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> above the <S%H2022>mountains<s%>.
At <S%H4480><s%> thy <S%H1606>rebuke<s%> they <S%H5127>fled<s%>; At the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of thy <S%H7482>thunder<s%> they hasted <S%H2648>away<s%>
(The <S%H2022>mountains<s%> <S%H5927>rose<s%>, the <S%H1237>valleys<s%> sank <S%H3381>down<s%>) Unto the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H2088>which<s%> thou hadst founded for <S%H3245>them<s%>.
Thou hast <S%H7760>set<s%> a <S%H1366>bound<s%> that they may not pass <S%H5674>over<s%>; That they turn not <S%H7725>again<s%> to <S%H3680>cover<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%>.
He <S%H7971>sendeth<s%> forth <S%H4599>springs<s%> into the <S%H5158>valleys<s%>; They <S%H1980>run<s%> among the <S%H2022>mountains<s%>;
They give <S%H8248>drink<s%> to every <S%H2416>beast<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%>; The wild <S%H6501>asses<s%> <S%H7665>quench<s%> their <S%H6772>thirst<s%>.
By them the <S%H5775>birds<s%> of the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> have their <S%H7931>habitation<s%>; They <S%H5414>sing<s%> <S%H996>among<s%> the <S%H6073>branches<s%>.
He <S%H8248>watereth<s%> the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> from his <S%H5944>chambers<s%>: The <S%H776>earth<s%> is <S%H7646>filled<s%> with the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of thy <S%H4639>works<s%>.

He causeth the <S%H2682>grass<s%> to <S%H6779>grow<s%> for the <S%H929>cattle<s%>, And <S%H6212>herb<s%> for the <S%H5656>service<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>; That he may bring <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H3899>food<s%> out of the <S%H776>earth<s%>,

And <S%H3196>wine<s%> that maketh <S%H8055>glad<s%> the <S%H3824>heart<s%> of <S%H582>man<s%>, And <S%H8081>oil<s%> to make his <S%H6440>face<s%> to <S%H6670>shine<s%>, And <S%H3899>bread<s%> that <S%H5582>strengtheneth<s%> <S%H582>man<s%>'s <S%H3824>heart<s%>.
The <S%H6086>trees<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> are <S%H7646>filled<s%> with <S%H730>moisture<s%>, The cedars of <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%>, which he hath <S%H5193>planted<s%>;
Where the <S%H6833>birds<s%> make their <S%H7077>nests<s%>: As for the <S%H2624>stork<s%>, the <S%H1265>fir-trees<s%> are her <S%H1004>house<s%>.
The <S%H1364>high<s%> <S%H2022>mountains<s%> are for the wild <S%H3277>goats<s%>; The <S%H5553>rocks<s%> are a <S%H4268>refuge<s%> for the <S%H8227>conies<s%>.
He <S%H6213>appointed<s%> the <S%H3394>moon<s%> for <S%H4150>seasons<s%>: The <S%H8121>sun<s%> <S%H3045>knoweth<s%> his going <S%H3996>down<s%>.
Thou <S%H7896>makest<s%> <S%H2822>darkness<s%>, and it is <S%H3915>night<s%>, Wherein all the <S%H2416>beasts<s%> of the <S%H3293>forest<s%> creep <S%H7430>forth<s%>.
The young <S%H3715>lions<s%> <S%H7580>roar<s%> after their <S%H2964>prey<s%>, And <S%H1245>seek<s%> their <S%H400>food<s%> from <S%H410>God<s%>.
The <S%H8121>sun<s%> <S%H2224>ariseth<s%>, they get them <S%H622>away<s%>, And lay them <S%H7257>down<s%> in their <S%H4585>dens<s%>.
Man <S%H120><s%> goeth <S%H3318>forth<s%> unto his <S%H6467>work<s%> And to his <S%H5656>labor<s%> until the <S%H6153>evening<s%>.

O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, how <S%H7231>manifold<s%> are thy <S%H4639>works<s%>! In <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> hast thou <S%H6213>made<s%> them <S%H776>all<s%>: The earth is <S%H4390>full<s%> of thy <S%H7075>riches<s%>.

Yonder is the <S%H3220>sea<s%>, <S%H1419>great<s%> and <S%H7342>wide<s%>, Wherein are things <S%H7431>creeping<s%> <S%H4557>innumerable<s%>, Both <S%H6996>small<s%> and <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H2416>beasts<s%>.
There <S%H1980>go<s%> the <S%H591>ships<s%>; There is <S%H3882>leviathan<s%>, whom thou hast <S%H3335>formed<s%> to play <S%H7832>therein<s%>.
These <S%H7663>wait<s%> all for <S%H5414>thee<s%>, That thou mayest give them their <S%H400>food<s%> in due <S%H6256>season<s%>.
Thou <S%H5414>givest<s%> unto <S%H3950>them<s%>, they gather; Thou <S%H6605>openest<s%> thy <S%H3027>hand<s%>, they are <S%H7646>satisfied<s%> with <S%H2896>good<s%>.

Thou <S%H5641>hidest<s%> thy <S%H6440>face<s%>, they are <S%H926>troubled<s%>; Thou takest <S%H622>away<s%> their <S%H7307>breath<s%>, they <S%H1478>die<s%>, And <S%H7725>return<s%> to their <S%H6083>dust<s%>.
Thou <S%H7971>sendest<s%> forth thy <S%H7307>Spirit<s%>, they are <S%H1254>created<s%>; And thou <S%H2318>renewest<s%> the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H127>ground<s%>.
Let the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> endure for <S%H5769>ever<s%>; Let <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> in his <S%H4639>works<s%>:
Who <S%H5027>looketh<s%> on the <S%H776>earth<s%>, and it <S%H7460>trembleth<s%>; He <S%H5060>toucheth<s%> the <S%H2022>mountains<s%>, and they <S%H6225>smoke<s%>.
I will <S%H7891>sing<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> as long as I <S%H2416>live<s%>: I will <S%H2167>sing<s%> praise to my <S%H430>God<s%> while I have any <S%H5750>being<s%>.
Let thy <S%H7879>meditation<s%> be <S%H6149>sweet<s%> unto <S%H8055>him<s%>: I will rejoice in <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

Let <S%H2400>sinners<s%> be <S%H8552>consumed<s%> out of the <S%H776>earth<s%>. And let the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> be no <S%H1288>more<s%>. Bless <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, O my <S%H5315>soul<s%>. <S%H1288>Praise<s%> ye <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.
